(Smokescreen is not in that room)


Rex/Firearm/Grimmler/Smokescreen:



Rex opened fire on Bright Blade as she ran.


Entering the hall way set off the autoguns, which opened fire on 
Bright Blade.

Firearm ran out of the room, firing off three plasma bolts from his 
arm cannon at Bright Blade's legs, giving chase, followed by Rex, 
Grimmler.

---

Smokescreen entered the bridge, looking over the screens that showed 
what the cameras saw.  He saw Bright Blade running, bein chase.  He 
activated the autoguns in front of her, which opened fire on her.  He 
manually took control of one of them, firing at her knees.
